newsitem.title: USA: Dun & Bradstreet Corp Q1 earnings summary.
newsitem.headline: Dun & Bradstreet Corp Q1 earnings summary.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)

NOTE: The 1996 results are on an "as adjusted" basis, which exclude the one-time transaction costs associated with reorganization, other non-recurring items and the results of divested businesses, and adjust corporate overhead, interest expense and income taxes to expected post-reorganization levels.

Compared with 1996 first quarter "as reported" results, 1997 Q1 revenue increased by $8.6 million from reported 1996 revenue of $450.4 million, which included revenue from operations that were subsequently divested.

1997 Q1 net income declined by $26.2 million from 1996 net income of $64.2 million, or $0.38 per share. 1996 Q1 reported results included income, net of taxes, of $42.3 million from operations that were sold, spun off or discontinued.
